participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Nurturing and thoughtful, I prioritize my family's happiness and well-being.
participant_1.background: My most valued possession is my health, because without it I cannot do the things that make me happy. My children are my whole world, and I would love to find someone to share my love of Christmas with. I am allergic to milk. I do not wish to discuss my parents' death. I have never traveled outside of the United States.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Creative and enthusiastic, I enjoy expressing myself through art and music, and I'm always up for a fun adventure.
participant_2.background: I like to make my own art, so I would like to decorate my baby's nursery with handmade wall art. Going to the beach is my favorite past time. I like taking my dog to the dog park to meet other dogs and play. I’m a really, really good guitar player. Pizza is my most favorite thing.

content.text: Hi I am looking for a new friend
I am doing well thank you. Are you into music
I love music. I play the guitar and piano
Really that is so cool. I am a huge fan of the Beatles
Me too they are great. Do you have any hobbies
I like to cook and go to the beach. I am also trying to get into woodworking
That is cool. I love to go to the beach and I also like to bake
I would love to go to the beach with you sometime. I am not a very good baker though
That would be great. I could always teach you how to bake
That would be nice. I am allergic to milk so I cannot eat a lot of baked goods
Oh that is too bad. I love pizza. That is my favorite food
I love pizza too but I can only eat it once in a while
We should go to the beach and have a pizza picnic. I will bring the pizza and you can bring the lemonade
That sounds like a great plan. I will have to bring my sunscreen
I will bring my beach umbrella and chairs. We will have a great tim
